docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. Human Rights Council must set up a commission of inquiry into Myanmar's human rights record, as it has done for North Korea and Eritrea, and not spare its leader because of her iconic status, a former U.S. human rights envoy said on Monday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Paladino said that he had meant to email his remarks to friends, but inadvertently sent them to Artvoice, a Buffalo weekly, which published them.
docs.abstract: Carl Paladino, member of Buffalo Board of Education, says he did not intend to send racist remarks about Pres and Michelle Obama to weekly newspaper Artvoice for publication, and that he will not heed calls for his resignation.

headline.main: Carl Paladino, a Trump Ally, Says Racist Remarks About Obamas Were Sent in Error
headline.print_headline: Slurs About Obamas Sent by Mistake, Paladino Says

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. President Donald Trump is expected to sign a measure as early as Tuesday aimed at rescinding a major Obama administration water regulation and direct an end to the government's defense of the rule, a Trump official briefed on the plan said late Friday.
